title: Game Crash
body: Hi, after my windows 10  Anniversary update my game keep crashing. I reverted back to the older version but the game still crashes. After I get in game , the second the champion spawn the game will just freezes and crashes. I have tried turning off the Xbox Game DVR but nothing has changed. Someone please help.

replies.body: If disabling the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) didn't resolve this, then there could be other issues causing a crash like outdated drivers or bad game files.  I suggest going over each step in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) to resolve this.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for some of these processes, like a clean reinstall.  Let me know if your issue persists after!
